(USANYS) < > wrote: 
(USANYS) < wrote: 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, September 3, 2019 6:01 PM 
To: 
Subject: Re: Santos Felix 
Do you happen to know if Santos still has an immigration hold? He believes that the hold was lifted. If it's not lifted 
then there's no reason to even consider a bail application. 
Law Offices of Javier A. Solano, PLLC 
EFTA00015340

On Aug 29, 2019, at 7:32 AM, (USANYS) < wrote: 
Great. Let's do 2:00 p.m. on Tuesday, September 3. We'll have ht to our office. The 
prosecutors handling the proffer will be and
From: 
Sent: Wednesda , August 28 2019 10:59 PM 
To: (USANYS) il 
Subject: Re: Santos Felix 
Let's do Tuesday afternoon. 
Law Offices of Javier A. Solano, PLLC 
EFTA00015341

On Aug 27, 2019, at 4:45 PM, (USANYS) < 
No worries. Can you do next week on Tuesday afternoon or Thursday morning? 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, August 27, 2019 4:40 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: ReMEM 
wrote: 
The jury went overnight again so unfortunately I will not be available tomorrow. We have to reschedule the 
proffer. 
My sincere apologies. 
Law Offices of Javier A. Solano, PLLC 
On Aug 27, 2019, at 9:43 AM, wrote: 
EFTA00015342

We summed up on Monday and I was expecting a verdict yesterday but the jury is still deliberating. I hope 
and expect y 
to get a verdict today, but I will let you know for sure at the end of the day. 
Law Offices of Javier A. Solano, PLLC 
On Aug 26, 2019, at 12:04 PM, E(USANYS)c: wrote: 
Hello, 
Are we confirmed for a proffer session with Mr. on Wednesday, August 28, at 12:00? We can do 
the proffer session at our office. 
Best Regards, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
EFTA00015343

United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00015344
